help.description: Provides Basic Help for Cold Bot and can also give you additional information on each command.

complements.complement1: , and the argument separator is `{{ value }}`
complements.complement2: ü™ê Requires some permissions for its use

help.text:
Hello, The prefix is `{{ prefix }}` {{ text1 }} 

:small_blue_diamond:To see the full list of commands use `{{ prefix }}cmds` 
 :small_blue_diamond:For a more detailed description of using Command, use: `{{ prefix }}h <command>`
:small_blue_diamond:For the administrator to change the language to use: `{{ prefix }}lang`

:small_blue_diamond:A command does not work as it should?, Use the command: `{{ prefix }}report`
:small_blue_diamond:Feel free to use `{{ prefix }}suggestbot` to receive your suggestions!

server.description: It shows the information of the server where you are.

ticket.description: This tool is useful to give individual supports to your server, where users can react and get a special channel for them and their questions.
ticket.descripDisabled: `At the moment the tickets are disabled.`
ticket.descripEnable:
@everyone `React with a `üì©` to open a ticket.`

Remember that there can only be a maximum of one open ticket per person.
ticket.descripTicket:
<@{{ id }}> your ticket has been requested. React with a '‚ùå' to close the Ticket.

Administrators can also delete their Ticket

avatar.usage: ```{{ p }} avatar``````{{ p }} avatar [User]``````{{ p }} avatar [User/Text] {{ s }} -gen```
avatar.description: Show your Discord avatar, with a link to download it. or you can also generate an avatar either with a user, or generate it through a phrase / text.
avatar.title: {{ user }}'s Avatar

profile.usage: ```{{ p }} profile``````{{ p }} profile [User]``````{{ p }} profile [User] {{ s }} -img``````{{ p }} profile -img```
profile.description: Show your profile information on the server where you are. you can also make it show through an image.

clear.description: Delete the number of messages you write in the first argument, a maximum of 99.
clear.error: You cannot put negative numbers or delete more than 99 messages
clear.message: <@{{ user }}> delete `{{ number }}` messages of <#{{ channel }}>

meme.usage: ```{{ p }} meme <image link> {{ s }} <text> {{ s }} [Hexadecimal Color]``````{{ p }} meme <link> {{ s }} <text>```
meme.description: Generate a meme through an image and text that you send, you can also optionally send the color of the text.
